metadata.synopsis: This dialogue has two versions: SwA and non-SwA. In the non-SwA version, the squirrel communicates via squeaks or through the narrator.In the SwA version, the squirrel speaks like a human. She shouldn't sound like a disney animal. She's serious about getting the player to leave - she sees them as a threat - but she's also cocky about it. She doesn't think she'll have any problem beating the player the player to a pulp.Players encounter the squirrel in the druid grove. For all he knows, they're encroaching on HER territory, and she wants them out. Players have several options to deal with him in SwA - persuading or intimidating her. In both versions, they can kick her to death, if they choose.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 209.06, 26.53, 405.40 and move forward to trigger Attack on Den situation.4. killcombat to resolve it.5. goto 237.55, 31.08, 468.206. Talk with Timber the squirrel

154.speaker: Player
154.text: What sort of creature are you?

44.speaker: Timber
44.text: The sort that's in charge around here.

156.speaker: Narrator
156.text: *Before you can think twice, your lustful body speaks its profane language.*

54.speaker: Timber
54.text: Try it again. I dare you.

46.text: Try it again. I dare you.

31.speaker: Timber
31.text: Try it again. I dare you.

36.speaker: Player
36.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

58.speaker: Timber
58.text: You're trespassing. This is my territory.

128.speaker: Player
128.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

110.speaker: Timber
110.text: You barged in without an invitation. I wouldn't call that friendly.
110.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

124.speaker: Timber
124.text: See, you're in my territory. And I want you gone.
124.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: All right, you win. I'm leaving.
106.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

52.speaker: Timber
52.text: I better not catch you around here again.

150.speaker: Player
150.text: Back off, squirrel. Or I'll make you.
150.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

140.speaker: Timber
140.text: Okay, okay, calm down. We can make a deal.
140.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

11.speaker: Timber
11.text: Okay, okay, calm down. We can make a deal.
11.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

84.speaker: Timber
84.text: How about this - you can stay if you keep those ugly feet on the ground.
84.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

69.speaker: Timber
69.text: I'll even sweeten the pot. Found some weird smelling stuff on the ground. You can keep it. But...
69.context: NodeContext: sweet but an edge to your voice at the end. You're about to threaten.

105.speaker: Timber
105.text: The trees are mine. Follow the rules, and I won't have to intervene. Got it?

120.text: You don't scare me. I got bears on my side.

90.speaker: Timber
90.text: You don't scare me. I got bears on my side.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: There's plenty of room for both of us.

42.speaker: Timber
42.text: No, there's plenty of room for me.

146.text: No, there's plenty of room for me.

98.speaker: Timber
98.text: No, there's plenty of room for me.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I could eat you whole - you can pretend I'm gone, once you're in the dark of my belly.

149.text: You'd have to catch me first. Can't say I'm worried.

139.speaker: Timber
139.text: You'd have to catch me first. Can't say I'm worried.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: One word and I could fry you to a crisp.

63.text: I doubt you could muster more than a bit of smoke.

1.speaker: Timber
1.text: I doubt you could muster more than a bit of smoke.

127.speaker: Player
127.text: Let me pass, or I'll spread word about this wonderful patch of land ripe for the taking.

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *This squirrel might be the single most adorable creature you can recall in all your stunted memory!*

79.speaker: Narrator
79.text: *It would be ever so twee if it were climbing a tree!*
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge grinning cruelly. Doesn't red-out, reuses cinematic.NodeContext: Dark Urge is about to kick it to its death against a tree, but should sound childishly playful

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Terrific. If I'm ever harangued by a rodent, I'll know who to call for.
16.context: NodeContext: Sarcastic/deeply unimpressed (player killed a rabbit)

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: Terrific. If I'm ever harangued by a rodent, I'll know who to call for.
59.context: NodeContext: Sarcastic/deeply unimpressed (player killed a rabbit)

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: How heroic. I was wondering if we'd survive encountering such a fearsome beast.
91.context: NodeContext: Sarcastic/deeply unimpressed (player killed a rabbit)

113.speaker: Astarion
113.text: Do you always take on such terrifying foes?
113.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Play killed a rabbit for no good reason.

75.speaker: Wyll
75.text: Gods! What in the deepest Hell is wrong with you?
75.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Play killed a rabbit for no good reason.

111.speaker: Gale
111.text: Surely you should be reserving your foot for more deserving foes? That poor creature was harmless!
111.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Play killed a rabbit for no good reason.

20.speaker: Karlach
20.context: NodeContext: Stunned by what the player just did (kicked a squirrel to death. She's shocked rather than angry).

81.speaker: Player
81.text: My body moved without my command... I couldn't control it.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: My instincts are sharp, daggered things. Stay out of their way.

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *The swirling bile-cauldron of your brain is cooking up a poison stew.*

119.speaker: Narrator
119.text: *Served and seasoned by that venomous Butler.*

27.speaker: Timber
27.text: *You stare at the body before you. You have no idea what just happened.*

131.speaker: Narrator
131.text: *You stare at the body before you. You have no idea what just happened.*

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Take fright: your thoughts just possessed you.

138.speaker: Player
138.text: Take heart: your instincts are dagger-sharp!

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Forget about it. It was a waste of space.

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *The squirrel flicks her tail at you and turns away.*

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *The squirrel lunges at your foot and bites it.*
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

61.speaker: Player
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

117.speaker: Narrator
117.text: *The squirrel moves too quickly - your foot finds only air.*

5.text: *The squirrel moves too quickly - your foot finds only air.*

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *The squirrel moves too quickly - your foot finds only air.*

7.speaker: Player
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

118.speaker: Narrator
118.text: *You follow the squirrel's gaze to a pair of clumsy, ugly feet. Your own, on her territory.*
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *You follow the squirrel's gaze to a pair of clumsy, ugly feet. Your own, on her territory.*
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *Looking around, 'her territory' extends from one end of the grove to another.*
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

30.speaker: Player
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *It is unnecessarily odd. A small, noisy pest with a bushy tail.*

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *You cannot imagine what purpose such a creature could possibly serve.*

77.speaker: Player
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

28.text: *The squirrel chitters scornfully as your foot whistles over her head.*
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *The squirrel chitters scornfully as your foot whistles over her head.*
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player kicks and misses the squirrel

39.speaker: Player
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Player fatally kicks the squirrel in the head. She collapses.|

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The squirrel flees, shrieking with indignant terror.*

136.speaker: Player
136.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Player fatally kicks the squirrel in the head. She collapses.|

112.speaker: Narrator
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Player fatally kicks the squirrel in the head. She collapses.|

71.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Player fatally kicks the squirrel in the head. She collapses.|

43.speaker: Astarion
43.text: Oh, it's everywhere. You ruined a perfectly good snack.
43.context: NodeContext: Is annoyed that you stamped a squirrel to death when he could've eaten it

13.speaker: Player
13.text: *You claim victory over the squirrel, though you're not sure why you were fighting to begin with.*

87.speaker: Narrator
87.text: *You claim victory over the squirrel, though you're not sure why you were fighting to begin with.*

147.speaker: Narrator
147.text: *It seems you've claimed the squirrel's territory by right of conquest.*

55.speaker: Player
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *Is Lady Shar punishing you? Or perhaps testing you? Is it the tadpole, or a curse? You cannot say.*
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

144.speaker: Timber
144.text: Not even close. To think I took you for a threat.
144.context: NodeContext: Losing interest in the conversation.

64.speaker: Timber
64.text: Now get moving. I'm tired of looking at you.
64.context: NodeContext: Losing interest in the conversation.

123.speaker: Narrator
123.text: *With a cocky flick of her tail, the squirrel scampers away.*

142.speaker: Player
142.text: Silently petition Lady Shar for guidance.
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

72.speaker: Narrator
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Breathe. Try to push past the sensation.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *Useless. The pain grips tight, sapping all composure out of you...*
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Intense pain flares from the wound on your hand. A strange, half-familiar image comes to you: a dead mouse, seen through a veil of tears. The image fades.*
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.InternalNodeContext: Incurable wound imagey/memory fragment - SH recalls the death of her pet mouse in Shar's Grotto, when she was a child.

32.speaker: Player
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.NodeContext: Wince of pain. Shadowheart's incurable wound is inflicting a short burst of intense magic pain throughout her body, before fading away.

48.speaker: Player
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.NodeContext: Wince of pain. Shadowheart's incurable wound is inflicting a short burst of intense magic pain throughout her body, before fading away.

135.speaker: Shadowheart
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.NodeContext: Wince of pain. Shadowheart's incurable wound is inflicting a short burst of intense magic pain throughout her body, before fading away.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Scold her with a click of your tongue.

18.text: *She studies you for a moment before twitching her ears. Compromise.*

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *She studies you for a moment before twitching her ears. Compromise.*

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *After a final squeak of warning - break the rules, and there will be trouble - she scurries away.*

92.speaker: Narrator
92.text: *The squirrel freezes, muscles tensed in alarm. She gets the message.*

101.speaker: Narrator
101.text: *The squirrel freezes, muscles tensed in alarm. She gets the message.*

132.text: *She chatters back, louder and at length.*

141.speaker: Narrator
141.text: *She chatters back, louder and at length.*

104.speaker: Narrator
104.text: *Tail rigid with irritation, she scampers off.*

134.text: *Her motivations elude you. Distracted by your thoughts, you let your guard down.*

93.speaker: Narrator
93.text: *Her motivations elude you. Distracted by your thoughts, you let your guard down.*

56.speaker: Timber
56.text: What did I tell you? Clear out!

153.speaker: Narrator
153.text: *The squirrel's tail twitches in a lukewarm salute.*
